alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Henrico; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 4:23PM EDT until May 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Chesterfield County in central Virginia... The City of Colonial Heights in central Virginia... The City of Hopewell in south central Virginia... The northeastern City of Petersburg in south central Virginia... Northwestern Prince George County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Henrico County in central Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chesterfield Court House, or near Chester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chester and Bellwood around 430 PM EDT. Colonial Heights, Virginia State University and Ettrick around 435 PM EDT. Petersburg and Fort Lee around 440 PM EDT. Hopewell around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pocahontas State Park, Beach, Meadowville, Birchett Estate, Drewrys Bluff, Petersburg National Battlefield, Centralia, Chesterfield and New Bohemia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Henrico; Prince George
